txt.en: 'You have done well this time, my young apprentice. The outlook for the Inn League is most dour, thanks to your deeds. That is four dwarves who have now turned their back on those terrible little hobbits and forsaken their folly once and for all!'
'You are here for the initiation as well, are you not? The Inn League would be glad to welcome another [placeholder]. Hurry, hurry! Those beers will not wait for you while you talk to me.'
An Irritating Initiation
That did the trick
'I am ashamed to be a dwarf when such betrayal is rampant in my kindred!'
That did the trick
'It's shameful!'
That seemed to do the trick

Óli can be found in Thorin's Hall, in the very inn where Jónar himself stands.\n\nJónar has demanded that you approach dwarves from Thorin's Hall that have joined the Inn League and harass them until they abandon this folly to take up arms with the Ale Association instead.
'Shameful, I tell you!'
That did the trick
Convince Herluf of Needlehole to abandon the Inn League

Óli can be found in Thorin's Hall, in the very inn where Jónar himself stands.\n\nJónar has demanded that you approach dwarves from Thorin's Hall that have joined the Inn League and harass them until they abandon this folly to take up arms with the Ale Association instead.
'Go out into the vale, [placeholder], and humiliate those who have betrayed my kin!'
Herluf is still not convinced; you should try again

Óli can be found in Thorin's Hall, in the very inn where Jónar himself stands.\n\nJónar has demanded that you approach dwarves from Thorin's Hall that have joined the Inn League and harass them until they abandon this folly to take up arms with the Ale Association instead.

'It is a travesty that any dwarf worth his salt would participate in a silly hobbit league rather than a true dwarf alliance. You must spread the word that our alliance has taken root, so that the traitorous dwarves may recover from their follies!'
Herluf is a stubborn fool! Try again

Kópur, a member of the Inn League, can be found in Noglond in Ered Luin, south of Thorin's Hall in the Vale of Thrain.\n\nJónar has demanded that you approach dwarves from Thorin's Hall that have joined the Inn League and harass them until they abandon this folly to take up arms with the Ale Association instead.
Talk to Jónar in Thorin's Hall

Kópur, a member of the Inn League, can be found in Noglond in Ered Luin, south of Thorin's Hall in the Vale of Thrain.\n\nJónar has demanded that you approach dwarves from Thorin's Hall that have joined the Inn League and harass them until they abandon this folly to take up arms with the Ale Association instead.

Grímar, a member of the Inn League, can be found in Gondamon in the very centre of Ered Luin.\n\nJónar has demanded that you approach dwarves from Thorin's Hall that have joined the Inn League and harass them until they abandon this folly to take up arms with the Ale Association instead.

Grímar, a member of the Inn League, can be found in Gondamon in the very centre of Ered Luin.\n\nJónar has demanded that you approach dwarves from Thorin's Hall that have joined the Inn League and harass them until they abandon this folly to take up arms with the Ale Association instead.

Grímar, a member of the Inn League, can be found in Gondamon in the very centre of Ered Luin.\n\nJónar has demanded that you approach dwarves from Thorin's Hall that have joined the Inn League and harass them until they abandon this folly to take up arms with the Ale Association instead.
Convince Óli of Thorin's Hall to abandon the Inn League
Óli is still unconvinced; you should try again.
Óli still looks unconvinced; you should try again.
Convince Kópur of Noglond to abandon the Inn League
Kópur is not convinced -- you should try again
Kópur is still not convinced -- one more time
Convince Grímar of Gondamon to abandon the Inn League
Grímar does not seem convinced; try again
Grímar is still not convinced -- try once more

Herluf can be found in Needlehole, a hobbit town with many dwarf inhabitants in the north-west corner of the Shire.\n\nJónar has demanded that you approach dwarves from Thorin's Hall that have joined the Inn League and harass them until they abandon this folly to take up arms with the Ale Association instead.

Herluf can be found in Needlehole, a hobbit town with many dwarf inhabitants in the north-west corner of the Shire.\n\nJónar has demanded that you approach dwarves from Thorin's Hall that have joined the Inn League and harass them until they abandon this folly to take up arms with the Ale Association instead.

Herluf can be found in Needlehole, a hobbit town with many dwarf inhabitants in the north-west corner of the Shire.\n\nJónar has demanded that you approach dwarves from Thorin's Hall that have joined the Inn League and harass them until they abandon this folly to take up arms with the Ale Association instead.

Jónar, a sinister and surly resident of Thorin's Hall, has grown increasingly sour towards the success of the Inn League.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
Jónar awaits you in Thorin's Hall.\n\nYou should return to Jónar with the encouraging news that you were able to bully the Inn League dwarves into abandoning their foolish pursuits.

'Do you know how many dwarves have joined the Inn League? It is shameful! No self-respecting dwarf has any business joining that hobbit-guild, if you ask me.

'I demand that you harass those fools until they see some sense and join my illustrious Ale Association, and sever all ties with those stumpy, furry-headed hobbits of the Inn League. Do not stop until they are reasonable once again!

'Shameful. Shameful, shameful.'
